annonstext:
Our world is a world of change.

Our organization is based on people and great teamwork. We are a truly global company, we rely on diversity and together we create a workplace that brings the best out of everyone.

Here at Volvo CE we are driven by the idea that through imagination, hard work and technological innovation we will lead the way towards developing a world that is cleaner, smarter and more connected.

We believe in a sustainable future and with the global construction industry as our arena, we work together with our customers to turn this belief into reality for people everywhere. That is our purpose,

and we live and breathe it, every day.  With that, we are “Building Tomorrow”!

Do you want to be a part of building the world we want to live in?

Right now we are looking for a senior IT-architect focused on our analytics platform and solutions, you will be an important member of the information management and enterprise architecture team in digital and IT and cooperate with stakeholders both within and outside the company.

Opportunity description:   

You will have a vital role in designing and implementing analytics platform and solutions and thus create value both within and outside of the company.

Cooperate with partners within and outside of Volvo to lead the IT-architecture work and integrate cloud-platforms and information flow for our analytics platform, data lake and analytics solutions.

Work closely with the head of analytics, the analytics domain leaders and the analytics IT delivery team in all part of the life cycle together with business stakeholders, e.g. innovation – development – runtime.

Collaborate with architects with other focus areas to find solutions that works well together balancing many quality attributes within and across solutions.

Actively lead the target architecture work for analytics as part of the overall Volvo CE target architecture.

Mindset and Competence: 

	Passionate about IT-architecture enabling analytics and how to balance technology and business needs
	You have deep knowledge in technologies we are targeting such as Azure service bus, Azure analytics components such as databricks, delta lake and synapse
	Many years of experience from IT architecture and solution development based on cloud platforms (e.g. AWS, Azure, Google cloud) and experience of a hybrid setup with multi-cloud and on-premise, before this you have also worked with data warehouse and business intelligence solutions
	You have experience from working with analytics solutions based on information from multiple sources and multiple integration frameworks to integrate data from e.g. connected devices, PLM, ERP, CRM and other internal and external IT-systems
	You have a good understanding of design patterns and appreciation of the purpose and the practices of Agile
	You have failed and overcome difficulties and learned from mistakes
	You have experience from working in a global environment
	You have demonstrated a growth and learning mindset

Who are you?

We don’t know yet, do we?

Our values are Trust, Passion, Change, Performance and Customer Success, and if they light your inner fire, you might be the next player in our great team! In preparation our discussion, we would appreciate if you consider the following questions in your application/cover letter:

	What is the bravest decision you have taken in the last 6 months?
	Describe your most successful collaboration the last year?
	Describe our future digital landscape (in 5 year) and our opportunities in that scenario?

For more information please contact:

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Head of Info Mgmt & Enterprise Arch.,  TELEPHONENO
